type: Tutorial Step - Spread the Word on Twitter!

definition.text: Making some noise on Twitter will help bring more traders to the project. That's important too, for similar reasons!

paragraphs.text: The more traders using Superalgos, the more they will drive the Core Team to develop ever more advanced features! This is what you need to do:
Go to our Twitter page, follow us, and retweet our latest tweet. Make sure you tag traders you follow!
That's it! No big deal, right?
We appreciate your help and wish you some happy and prosperous trading!
